name: Shradha
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Happy Birthday to the most amazing friend who's 1900 km away but always close to me. ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many many.... happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Your smile lights up my world, and your kindness makes every moment magical. Here's to celebrating you, no matter the distanceâ€”because true friendship knows no bounds!.
